name: Simple Birds: Fun and Cool Run
name_original: Simple Birds: Fun and Cool Run
description:
Tap and fly! Don't touch the pipes! More you fly, more dangerous your journey is! How long can you stay alive? It really only depends on your skills and reaction.

How to play:
Simply tap your finger on the screen before your bird falls down getting as far as you can. A lot of fun and amazing adventure along with characters that you love.

**** Watch out!!! **** This is an easy to learn but hard to master game.

Try it now, play and have fun!
